text:
C >0 trades off the size of the margin and the total amount of slack that
we have. This parameter is called the regularization parameter since, asregularization
parameter we will see in the following section, the margin term in the objective func-
tion (12.26a) is a regularization term. The margin term ∥w∥2 is called
the regularizer, and in many books on numerical optimization, the reg-regularizer
ularization parameter is multiplied with this term (Section 8.2.3). This
